## Barbara Dalmaso, B.sC., MBA, Ph.D.
<div style="text-align:center;">
  <img src="data/img.jpg" style="width:200px; height:200px; border-radius:50%;" />
</div>

**Barbara** is a biomedical researcher 🔬 and bioinformatician with experience in studying neurodegenerative diseases 🧠 and cancer. She is dedicated to bridging data science 📊 with biology and health by transforming genomics and clinical data into decision-making processes, with a strong focus on next-generation sequencing and patient-centered analytics.  

In recent years, she has developed reproducible statistical pipelines to support precision medicine, translational research, and clinical trials 🧫.  

Barbara has also been a speaker 🎤 at major conferences in the field of medical statistics around the world, including **Biomolecular Horizons** (Melbourne, Australia), **Computational Intelligence Methods for Bioinformatics and Biostatistics** (Benevento, Italy), **Applied Bioinformatics for Life Sciences** (Leuven, Belgium), among others.


Currently works as Statistical Programmer at the biopharmaceutical Syneos Health.
